name: Psychological Operations
description: Using behavioral psychology to influence, manipulate, and control outcomes in intelligence settings.

cards.title: Coercion and Persuasion Tactics
cards.description: Psychological methods for influencing decisions and altering behaviors.
bulletpoints: Apply social engineering principles for intelligence gathering
Use framing and priming techniques to control narratives
Leverage fear, obligation, and guilt for compliance

cards.title: Strategic Psychological Operations
cards.description: Coordinating large-scale psychological campaigns to shift perceptions and create division.
bulletpoints: Use media and propaganda to influence public perception
Exploit psychological vulnerabilities in adversarial groups
Deploy misinformation and disinformation tactics for strategic advantage
